AboutDescription: Demonstrating seamless data flow between industrial automation systems and modern web interfaces
ContactSubtitle: This is a personal project I am developing on my own, explore the code or get in touch
ConnectCollaborateDescription: If you are interested in discussing ideas or connecting professionally, I am always open to collaboration.
dotnet_description: Server-side runtime enabling real-time communication and data processing between systems.
factory-io_description: 3D factory simulation platform providing realistic industrial automation scenarios and equipment modeling.
HeroSubtitle: Bridging industrial automation and web technology through seamless integration of
IndustrialIntegrationDescription: Factory IO simulates real industrial processes, while TIA Portal provides PLC programming capabilities, creating an authentic automation environment.
InteractiveFactorySimulationDescription: Watch pixel art animations come to life as data flows between Factory IO, TIA Portal, and React in real-time
LiveDemoDescription: Experience the integration in action with interactive pixel art animations
protocols_description: OPC UA and HTTP enabling communication between industrial devices and web services.
react_description: Modern JavaScript/TypeScript framework for building responsive user interfaces and real-time data visualization dashboards.
TechnologiesDescription: Cutting-edge tools and platforms powering the integration
tia-portal_description: Siemens engineering framework for PLC programming, and industrial automation control.
WebInterfaceDescription: React-based dashboard provides real-time monitoring and control capabilities, bridging the gap between industrial systems and modern web technologies.
